properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORTCOUNT, M.SIGNIN_DATE AS SIGNIN_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS BOARDCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) >= 1 ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC) B

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORTCOUNT , M.SIGNIN_DATE AS SIGNIN_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS BOARDCOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT , (SELECT REPORT_CONTENT FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AS REPORT_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) >= 1 ORDER BY MEM_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM REPORTED_MEM

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , LIMIT_REASON , CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'B' THEN '강제탈퇴' WHEN ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'S' THEN '활동중지 ' || NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DATE) - TO_DATE(START_DATE) + 1), '-') || '일' END AS ACTIVITY_STATUS , CASE WHEN ACTIVITY_STATUS = 'B' THEN '-' ELSE START_DATE || ' - ' || END_DATE END AS SUSPEND_DATE FROM MEMBER JOIN REPORTED_MEM USING (MEM_NO) ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEM_ID, ADMIN_NO, CANCEL_DATE FROM CANCELED_MEM C JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEM_NO)
